400.name: Close Call
400.description: When in Danger, attacks miss 25% of the time. Doesn't stack.

401.name: Last Stand
401.description: When in Danger, enemy attacks deal half-damage. Doesn't stack.

402.name: Power Rush
402.description: When in Danger, deal +2 damage with attacks. Doesn't stack.

411.name: Jumpman
411.description: Enables your attacks to hit at any height

412.name: Hammerman
412.description: Enables your attacks to hit at any depth

420.name: Spike Shield
420.description: Allows direct attacks to safely damage spiky enemies.

421.name: Ice Power
421.description: Allows direct attacks to safely damage fiery enemies.

422.name: Zap Tap
422.description: Allows direct attacks to safely damage elecrified enemies. Electrifies the user.

430.name: Feeling Fine
430.description: Become immune to Poison, Burn, Dizzy, Blind, Confusion, and Slow.

431.name: Pretty Lucky
431.description: 20% chance to dodge attacks. Does not stack.

432.name: Lucky Start
432.description: Start with the invisible, fast, or payback status for two turns.

440.name: P-Down, D-Up
440.description: *Decreases* damage dealt and received by one.

441.name: P-Up, D-Down
441.description: *Increases* damage dealt and received by one.

450.name: HP Plus
450.description: Increase max HP by half your level. Does not stack.

451.name: Happy Heart
451.description: Recover 2 HP at the beginning of each turn.

460.name: FP Plus
460.description: Increase max FP by half your level. Does not stack.

461.name: Happy Flower
461.description: Recover 1 FP at the beginning of each turn.

462.name: Flower Saver
462.description: The cost of FP moves is lowered by 1.

463.name: Pity Flower
463.description: Recover 1 FP when damaged by an attack.

500.name: Charge
500.description: Adds Charge (1 FP) to commands. Charge boosts your next attack by 1x ATK.

510.name: Hammer Throw
510.description: Increase a single-target attack’s FP cost by 1 and allow it to reach anywhere.

511.name: Piercing Blow
511.description: Increase a single-target attack’s FP cost by 2 and allow it to pierce defense.

512.name: Tornado Jump
512.description: Increase one attack’s power by 2 but limit its range to Floating and Flying only.

513.name: Quake Hammer
513.description: Increase one attack’s power by 2 but limit its range to Ground and Ceiling only.
